meanings.sent1: His gasconade about his achievements was tiresome to listen to.
meanings.sent2: The politician's gasconade about his plans for the city impressed some voters.
meanings.sent3: During the game, his gasconade about being the best player made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her gasconade about her cooking skills was as empty as a deflated balloon.
meanings.sent5: The knight's gasconade about his bravery echoed through the castle halls.

meanings.sent1: She couldn't stand being around a gasconade who always talked about himself.
meanings.sent2: The office was filled with gasconades who constantly tried to one-up each other.
meanings.sent3: The gasconade strutted around the party as if he owned the place.
meanings.sent4: The old king was known as a gasconade in his youth, always boasting of his conquests.
meanings.sent5: The village was tired of the gasconade's endless tales of grandeur.
